name: The Door of Never
description: You have made your way through the catacombs beneath Mount Tipereth. Sifting though the remains of the unfortunate, who have failed. Collecting all ten of the glowing crystal keys of Delgail. Now you stand before the only obstacle that separates you from the imprisoned soul of the Abyssal Dragon. The Door of Never is a teleporter to the bottomless pit, where the spirit Quotel has been trapped for hundreds of years. He alone, knows the whereabouts of the sword of the Celestial Knight.
